text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Trainer, in three days' time I will once more put this question to you and the others.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: At that time, I want you to exemplify your answer in some manner.

The day after Symboli Rudolf had assigned 
me this task, I found myself deep in thought, 
pondering my next move, when ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh… what a coincidence. Is this seat opposite you taken?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Great. It starts to get crowded around this time, 
and I'd like to leave some seats available at least.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
By the way… I couldn't help but notice you seem 
a bit troubled. Is there something on your mind?
choice_data_list: <size=32>I've been thinking about what you said to me…</size>
<size=32>I've been thinking about what you said to me…</size>

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, of course. I apologize for causing you concern.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It might not be my place to say this, but dwelling 
too much on things isn't healthy. Sometimes it's 
crucial to take a breather and clear your mind.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
How about we grab a sweet treat or two 
here in the cafeteria? It might help.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Carbohydrates provide energy for the brain, and fruits, 
vegetables, and whole grains can enhance mental focus.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Looking at today's menu… 
I'd recommend the seasonal fruit salad.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Whoops… speaking to a professional trainer, 
perhaps I'm simply "watering the ocean".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
These things are often on my mind… It would seem that has 
caused me to talk on about them inadvertently.
choice_data_list: Are you always that attentive to it?
Are you always that attentive to it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I am. To us horsegirls, diet is of significant importance 
both in developing our bodies and feeling fulfilled…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
"What is the optimal meal for me at the present moment?" 
… It's a crucial and endlessly pondered question.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Of course, this concerns not only food. 
In all aspects of daily life I strive to discover 
and appreciate deeper meanings.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Maintaining a broad perspective allows every aspect of life 
to become a driving force. It's an essential attitude to hold 
if I want to reach the great heights of my ambitions.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, being admired so directly certainly 
makes me feel a little bashful.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This way of thinking has been ingrained in me since 
childhood… It has become a hard-to-break habit.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
… In any case, sometimes having an incurable 
habit can form a bit of a problem.

At those words, I followed Symboli Rudolf's gaze 
and surveyed our surroundings ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Oh my… It looks like Prez and that trainer 
are having quite the intense conversation…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
We shouldn't interrupt them… 
Let's find somewhere else to eat…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
… As you can see, despite my efforts to squeeze in with you, 
I've unintentionally created empty seats around us.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
As the student president, I want students to feel comfortable 
coming to me with their concerns. This way, I can serve as a 
better guide to them…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: However, I seem to come off as intimidating or overly serious.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If only I could initiate lighthearted and witty 
conversations that entertain everyone ——
choice_data_list:
How about we practice having 
that kind of conversation?

How about we practice having 
that kind of conversation?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: What? ……With you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Hahahah!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My apologies. How do I put this, you're… 
quite easy to get along with. I didn't expect 
you to come with a suggestion like that.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Alright, it's worth a shot! Let's give it a try.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If you don't mind, could you suggest a topic for conversation? 
Anything will do. Just something we can chat about naturally.
choice_data_list: Do you have any hobbies besides running?
Do you have any hobbies besides running?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hobbies! That's a good approach. 
We can talk about those in a casual manner.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm particularly fond of playing chess. Not only sitting at the 
board, but also reading scores and game records is enjoyable.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Constantly assessing the battlefield, deciphering the 
opponent's thoughts, and planning each move towards 
a desired future — it's like a microcosm of life…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
…… Wait a minute, we're getting into 
serious territory again, aren't we?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I suppose it's not something I can 
change overnight. This is difficult…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
… Oh, that reminds me! I have been looking into something in 
the hope that it could be of assistance in some light table talk!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Namely — jokes! A witty bit of humor 
that can lighten the mood instantly!
choice_data_list: I see! I'd love to hear one.
I see! I'd love to hear one.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Alright then!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The other day, I was walking down the street, and I saw a dog 
with a stunning coat. I couldn't resist exclaiming……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: "Woof-derful!"

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— How was that, Trainer!?

I discovered an unexpected side of her, but… overall, I felt 
like I had gained some insight into Symboli Rudolf.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, "woof-derful"… 
I was rather proud of that one……
